projects.title: C-SAT Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive dashboard that tracks account, agent and leader performance in customer satisfaction
projects.longDescription: This interactive dashboard provides a comprehensive view of customer satisfaction for a single account, allowing you to track and analyze the performance of both agents and leaders. It consolidates key metrics into intuitive visualizations, enabling quick identification of trends, strengths, and areas for improvement. With real-time updates and actionable insights, the dashboard supports data-driven decisions to enhance overall customer experience and drive team performance.

screenshots.description: Main Dashboard: Shows account-level analytics with Call/Chat queue options and a TL stats tracker filterable by leader or queue.
Analysis: Summarizes CSAT attribute highlights weaknesses, peak-day & breakdown when it comes to agent level stats

projects.title: QA Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive Dashboard that tracks agent, leader and account QA scores
projects.longDescription: This interactive dashboard tracks Quality Assurance (QA) scores across agents, leaders, and the overall account, providing a clear and consolidated view of performance. It offers intuitive visualizations that highlight trends, top performers, and areas needing improvement, enabling quick and informed decision-making. Designed for real-time monitoring, the dashboard helps drive accountability, enhance team performance, and ensure consistent service quality across the account.

screenshots.description: QA Dashboard : Helps monitor the total transaction evaluated by the QA team with a detailed description of each attribute and its percentage and failed cases.
TL Dashboard : Helps in providing an easily readable form of data so that team leaders and their managers are able to accurately track their team's progress and scores

projects.title: Personal Finances Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive Dashboard for personal finances
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive Excel-based financial dashboard that visualizes income, expenses, and savings trends. Designed for simplicity and insight, it automates data entry, categorization, and monthly analysis to help users make smarter financial decisions.

screenshots.description: Overview Page: This oage has year to date data regarding, Credit Debt, Overall Earnings, Overall spend, and Savings overview. with a tbale showing latest transactions.
Credit Card Page: This page is an extensive overview over your credit card, with detailed insights on due date, spend, and breaskdowns.
Income Page : This page is adetailed breakdown of your monthly income, the spend breakdown, current net worth.
